Container.Name: arr-dashboard
Container.Overview: A unified dashboard for managing multiple Sonarr, Radarr, and Prowlarr instances. Features include unified queue/calendar/history views, global indexer search, library management, TRaSH Guides integration, statistics, and TMDB content discovery.
Container.Description: Arr Dashboard provides a unified interface to manage all your Sonarr, Radarr, and Prowlarr instances from one place. View queues, calendars, and history across all instances. Search content globally across all indexers. Manage your media library with tag-based organization. Sync TRaSH Guides quality profiles and custom formats. Monitor health and statistics. Discover new content with TMDB integration. Supports OIDC (Authelia/Authentik) and passkey authentication. Built with modern architecture featuring zero-config Docker deployment, encrypted API keys, and secure session management.
